DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to examine the role of T-type calcium channels in endothelial dysfunction observed with ageing.
DOC.brief_title: Role of Calcium Channels in Vascular Function
DOC.criteria: age 20 30 and 6070 BMI < 30 Hypertension (>150/90 mmHg) Smoking Physical activity >2 hours/week Known chronic diseases Pregnancy or birth within 3 month Alcohol misuse
